channel.title: Comments on: Gun reloaded automatically every time I shot a bullet
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: 50pence777
item.dc:creator: 50pence777
item.description:
This just looks like normal gameplay to me, I might need that extra bullet to live.
Joking aside that's an odd glitch, sounds like the reload action got stuck constently repeating(and it can't reload when mag is full). Turning your controller off and on/unplugging your keyboard might work, if it doesn't then restarting the game will probally fix it.
P.s. If its a pc with keyboard open up a text editor and see if r is constently repeating, you might need to clean your keyboard.

item.title: By: modest_crayon
item.dc:creator: modest_crayon
item.description: This. I hate this, it happens to me, but more often my gun will continuously take a clip out and put a new one in. Keeps me from shooting. Normally fixes after I die
